response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value to us. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, we are extending an offer to you at a special price. We propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects our commitment to sharing the value this product can bring to you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We believe this is a mutually beneficial opportunity.", "product_price": 950000}
